channel.title: Hosting on Linux (Xubuntu)
channel.description:
So far, I've gotten the batches converted to shells (as far as I know).
When I open run.sh I get http://bit.ly/f4BoFt
My run.sh: [code=java]#!/bin/bash java -Xmx800m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server[/code]
My run.bat: [code=java]@echo off title PI Server java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Hoping to get some help, how can I make the configs and everything else for that matter -- work.
Thanks.
[b]Edit[/b] [hr] I now get this, but the above files still do not load.
[img]http://www.zimagez.com/full/bd961a0731efb1c06cf1a1e1e2ac62f3f48dd44d1d3ed85a26a1fcbd0408a4be361b1d3db48b55269a6366220676d92dbaba9586b96a1f96.php[/img]

item.title: Hosting on Linux (Xubuntu)
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

So far, I’ve gotten the batches converted to shells (as far as I know).

When I open run.sh I get http://bit.ly/f4BoFt

My run.sh:

#!/bin/bash java -Xmx800m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server

My run.bat:

@echo off title PI Server java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Hoping to get some help, how can I make the configs and everything else for that matter – work.

Thanks.

Edit
[hr]
I now get this, but the above files still do not load.

Read full topic
